name: openconductor
description: The orchestration platform for modern AI development. Deploy AI agents alongside your Vercel, v0, Supabase, and BaseHub workflow.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd packages/frontend && npm run dev" "cd packages/api && npm run dev"
scripts.build: (cd packages/shared && npm install --legacy-peer-deps) && (cd packages/frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps) && npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../cli && npm install

author: Your Name
